title: Meal Planner Input
description: Schema for the input to the AI Meal Planner API

number_of_days.description: Number of days for which the meal plan is to be generated.

number_of_meals_per_day.description: Number of main meals per day (e.g., breakfast, lunch, dinner).

include_snacks.description: Whether to include snacks in the meal plan.

preferred_cuisines.description: List of preferred cuisines (e.g., Italian, Mexican, Indian).

protein_goal_grams.description: Optional: Target daily protein intake in grams.

fat_goal_grams.description: Optional: Target daily fat intake in grams.

carb_goal_grams.description: Optional: Target daily carbohydrate intake in grams.
